channel.title: What grinds your gears on MoparScape?
channel.description:
Post things here that you don't like about the MoparScape community or forums. I'll begin.
I hate everyone with names that start with 'Owner' or 'Mod'. I accept that it's not my choice, but it gets on my wick.

item.title: What grinds your gears on MoparScape?
item.dc:creator: @busta123 busta123
item.description:
@busta123 wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:98, topic:314490”][quote author=Telenim link=topic=410966.msg3034430#msg3034430 date=1258617286]

Anyone want to try grind my gears? no momma jokes or daddi jokes. Family is out of bounds
[/quote]Your brother is so fat I don’t even know what to say

That is unusual[/quote]
your mom is so dumb she called me to get my phone number.

im sorry didnt mean to be mean.

Read full topic
item.source: What grinds your gears on MoparScape?

item.title: What grinds your gears on MoparScape?
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:102, topic:314490”][quote author=Jamie1200 link=topic=410966.msg3034677#msg3034677 date=1258650171]
Topics like this
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,411363.0.html
[/quote]We want order in the community. So GTFO.[/quote]

Well at this precise moment in time, telling me to fuck off isn’t going to help now is it. Why don’t you just leave the moderating the moderators, thats why they are here.
This community has enough order in it, we don’t need stupid topics that are just going to ruin the order.

Read full topic
item.source: What grinds your gears on MoparScape?

item.source: What grinds your gears on MoparScape?

item.title: What grinds your gears on MoparScape?
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

[quote=“Anfernio, post:99, topic:314490”][quote author=King Lingerz link=topic=410966.msg3034417#msg3034417 date=1258614963]
My gears are ground by people who are incapable of using decent spelling and grammar even if English is their first language.

My gears are ground by people who post in the wrong section deliberately.

I hate people who advertise on the forums, when they know they’re not supposed to.

I hate immature people.

I hate it when if you explain something, they usually don’t read it and just copy and paste an example, then ask why it doesn’t work.

I hate it when noobs just go straight to the help section to ask something instead of trying to figure out or find it themselves.

Hate is a strong word, and the only one that I don’t hate is the top one, so, modified. ;D
[/quote]

[quote author=King Lingerz link=topic=305477.msg2447851#msg2447851 date=1221832570]
Im now goin to restart my comp to try fix about 4 different fatal errors BRB
[/quote][/quote]

Ah, I see you’ve stumbled upon ‘the noob days’. Quite a lot can happen to a person in fourteen months.

I began using perfect spelling and grammar, learned what type of posts go in which sections, never advertised on the forums as far as I can remember, grew up, never copied and pasted examples, used to ask for help too soon quite a bit until I thought ‘Fuck them, I’ll do everything myself from now on.’, and here I am today. Hello there.

Read full topic
item.source: What grinds your gears on MoparScape?

item.title: What grinds your gears on MoparScape?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:90, topic:314490”][quote author=Anfernio link=topic=410966.msg3034012#msg3034012 date=1258591726]

Moderators who are barely old enough to play RuneScape. Ahem. Cognizant people should know what I mean.

Newty; m.dog; need I say more?
[/quote]

Yeah because 17 is “barely old enough to play RuneScape”.

Sorry I forgot that 17 is “barely” more then 13.[/quote]
I know you were replying to Anfernio; but, I’ll respond anyways. I am talking about the 15 year old moderators. They know who they are.

Read full topic

item.title: What grinds your gears on MoparScape?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:19, topic:314490”][quote author=Lin link=topic=410966.msg3031322#msg3031322 date=1258408523]

  1. People Who Talk Like This.
  2. People who try to act professional…
  3. People who come onto the IRC asking how to make a server without even realizing there’s a tutorial.

@Silabsoft: Cool, second place.
[/quote]I think i go to the 3rd option.[/quote]Yeah but you’re arab, completely different.

Read full topic
item.source: What grinds your gears on MoparScape?

item.title: What grinds your gears on MoparScape?
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“Anfernio, post:85, topic:314490”][quote author=lesterknome link=topic=410966.msg3034143#msg3034143 date=1258598465]

Moderators who are barely old enough to play RuneScape. Ahem. Cognizant people should know what I mean.

Newty; m.dog; need I say more?

Actually, I am old enough by a few years, and Newty is older ;). I see what you are getting at though

I would like to add to my list:
I hate love/hate lists in signatures.
I hate how I wait for the longest time for mitb to come on irc (for no reason really), and then he finally comes on when I’m not there.
I hate how my eyes bleed when I look at the client hacking section.
I hate how Lothy removed my powers in the RSC section.
I’ll think of more soon…

Change ur sig to
Veni, vidi, deficio

Anyway, lol:

People who post topics about leaving or bdays or other pointless shit
[/quote]

His signature stands for “I came, I saw, I conquered”. If you at least in a highschool level you’d know that.[/quote]

wtf es high skool?

What really grinds my gears, is when people add faces to the end of their sentences, for example, @notsoEpic Ancient

They use faces like >.> <.< -.-, etc, which are really annoying… The only cool one is ^^

Read full topic
item.source: What grinds your gears on MoparScape?

item.title: What grinds your gears on MoparScape?
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

m.dog311:

It’s I came, I saw, I conquered. Veni, vidi, deficio would be I came, I saw, I fail, which sounds completely retarded because you are talking in two different tenses.

Ya i made it retarded, Just for you.

Read full topic

item.title: What grinds your gears on MoparScape?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:78, topic:314490”]I hate when people join #moparscape, ask a question, and leaver. In a matter of 3 seconds.
i Hate People Who Type Like This Because They Think Its Cool And Then Leave Words Like i Lowercase.
I hate Rich.
I hate Rich.
Did I mention I hate Rich?
I hate how Taharok rules #moparscape and ruins all my fun.
I hate how other staff members bug me to solve reports.
I could go on for ever.[/quote]

Wow a lot of hate. :eek:

What grinds my gears at MoparScape.?

People who have mod or admin in front of there name, what is the point of that.?

Read full topic
